attributes.action: give the public a vote on the reintroduction of the death penalty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our great country is overrun by criminals who have no fear of the consequences of their actions. If found guilty of murder they will be sentenced to life (15 years) but will normally be released in half that time, after spending time inside watching their own tv, playing sport and generally laughing at the joke that is British justice.

It's about time that the British public were given the opportunity to vote on the re-introduction of the death penalty for 1st degree murder, acts of terrorism (both actual acts and attempted acts) and crimes of a violent of sexual nature against children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
